definition: (of a ship, train etc) not carrying any load (i.e. no passengers or freight etc)/(electricity) no-load (used to describe the condition of a transformer when there is no load connected to its secondary coil)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Foot switch board has quick lowering function when unload.
sentences.chinese: 脚踏开关板具备空载快速下降功能。

sentences.english: High no-load voltage and good ability of trust compensation.
sentences.chinese: 高的空载电压及良好的推力补偿功能。

sentences.english: Lift the suspension coop vacant load for 300mm and stop.
sentences.chinese: 将吊笼空载提升300毫米左右高度停止。

sentences.english: Valve as a whole item, easy service Foot switch board has quick lowering function when unload.
sentences.chinese: 脚踏开关板具备空载快速下降功能。

sentences.english: No-load loss, with the traditional machine than can be saving 50%.
sentences.chinese: 空载损耗小，与传统焊机比，可节电50%。

sentences.english: Setting open-circuit frequency and voltage algorithm for steady-state control power flow .
sentences.chinese: 稳态控制潮流的设定空载频率及空载电压算法。

sentences.english: Setting open-circuit frequency and voltage algorithm for steady-state control power flow .
sentences.chinese: 稳态控制潮流的设定空载频率及空载电压算法。

sentences.english: With little no-load loss, compared to traditional welder, it can save electricity about50%
sentences.chinese: 空载损耗小，与传统焊机比，可节电50%。

sentences.english: Now, with her containers still empty and the sun blazing overhead, she has returned home for a moment's rest.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，已是烈日当空，查雅空载而归，稍作休息。

sentences.english: This paper describes the effect of no-load deexcitation damping affect on deexcitation process.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了空载灭磁阻尼作用对灭磁过程的影响。

sentences.english: No-load voltage and higher energy Thrust better compensation, a wide range of uses.
sentences.chinese: 较高的空载电压和较好的能量推力补偿，用途广泛。

sentences.english: The response time of the analyser is made up of dead - time and equilibration.
sentences.chinese: 分析器的响应时间是由空载时间和平衡时间组成。

sentences.english: Using high quality silicon steel plates, its low loss and noise unladen small.
sentences.chinese: 采用优质的硅钢片，其空载损耗低及噪音小。

sentences.english: The barrel temperature field without load is tested and analysis.
sentences.chinese: 测试并分析了该机的空载下机筒的温度场。

sentences.english: It can improve the power factor of the motor when it is under low load or no load running.
sentences.chinese: 能提高电动机在轻载或空载时的功率因素。

sentences.english: The no load twisting moment measuring instrument of ball lead screw is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种测量滚珠丝杠空载扭矩的测量仪。
